story_zako_battle_28_02/3701_0101_0100_1:
The day is finally here! The day we sabotage the
PML once and for all!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3701_0101_0200_1:
We may have been unsuccessful on the day of
Elesa’s battle, but we won’t fail this time!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3701_0101_0300_1: It’s time to take our revenge!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3701_0501_0100_1: Tch! They’ve gotten even stronger than before!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3701_0501_0200_1:
But as you know, “Quantity over quality!” is
our motto!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3701_0501_0300_1:
We’ll round up some new Pokémon right away
and get our revenge for real!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0101_0200_1:
I said “right away,” didn’t I? We’re back with
some new Pokémon!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0101_0300_1:
There’s no way we’ll lose this time! Let’s get this
revenge rollin’!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0501_0200_1:
We’re not giving up, though! After all,
“Never give up!” is our mot—
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0501_0300_1: Pokémon Ranger en route! Wee woo wee woo!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0501_0400_1:
Give it up, Team Break! I won’t allow you to keep
doing your evil deeds!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0501_0500_1: I’m with the PML staff. I’ll be taking you in now!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0501_0600_1:
Mission accomplished! I won’t allow those bad
guys in Team Break to have their way around
here anymore!
story_zako_battle_28_02/3801_0501_0700_1:
Thanks to you all as well! Let’s protect the
PML together!
